src:
每天做50個波比跳 身體的每一塊肌肉都鍛鍊了（視頻）

06 Nov 2019, 04:45

【新唐人北京時間2019年11月06日訊】連續一個月每天做50個波比跳，看看發生什麼改變？
時間軸戳記：怎麼做出正確的波比跳 0:31第1天：我感到筋疲力盡 1:40第2天：為什麼我的身體受傷了？2:05第3天：我還是覺得笨手笨腳跟不上 2:30第5天：我的腹肌折磨死我了 3:14第7天：我肯定越練越好了！3:33第10天：發生了一些奇妙的事情 4:26第14天：我愛上了我的運動 4:45第20天：6分13秒！ 5:07第30天：時間到，總結我的經驗 5:35
以下YouTube視頻示範：



（責任編輯：張信燕） 本文網址: https://www.ntdtv.com/b5/2019/11/06/a102701105.html
text:
Do 50 bobbi jumps every day. Every muscle in the body is exercised (video)

06 Nov 2019, 04:45

[New Tang Dynasty Beijing time, November 06, 2019] Do 50 Bobbi jumps every day for a month to see what happens?
Timeline stamp: How to make the right Bobby jump 0:31 Day 1: I feel exhausted 1:40 Day 2: Why is my body injured? 2:05 Day 3: I still feel clumsy and can't keep up 2:30 Day 5: My abdominal muscles tortured me 3:14 Day 7: I definitely must practice as much as possible! 3:33 Day 10: Some wonderful things happened 4:26 Day 14: I fell in love with my sport 4:45 Day 20: 6 minutes and 13 seconds! 5:07 Day 30: Time is up, summing up my experience 5:35
The following YouTube video demo:
